ComicInfo.Summary:
R@dur-Rezz is out to assassinate all reality – and it seems as though Adam Archer has crossed the known universe to stop him! But with the Earth left unprotected, who will defend humanity against the threat of the Almighty Decimators? That’s right... we said, "DecimatorS"! Plural! Result!
WHAT IS THE PAYOFF FOR ALL THAT YOU’VE BEEN PRAYING FOR? GØDLAND IS!
Notes:
The cover is a homage to the panting of George Washington Crossing the Delaware.
ComicInfo.Title: Prophecy Plus
